articles.title: UPDATED: Bluebird joins the layoff flock to reality as gene therapy biotech sheds staff to save itself - Endpoints News
articles.description: Bluebird bio is laying off about 30% of its workforce to save itself before the FDA decides the fate of two of its gene therapies in August and September and plans to file for a third approval in the first quarter of next year. The dire situation came into cl…
